metadata.title: Áo dài bên hoa mộc lan
metadata.description: Concept đẹp xỉu cùng hoa Mộc lan

photos.content:
A serene young East Asian woman, appearing in her early twenties, with an oval face, fair skin, large almond-shaped dark brown eyes, delicate nose, and full lips tinted with a soft pink-orange hue, displays a gentle, serene smile, her cheeks adorned with a rosy blush, subtle winged eyeliner enhancing her long curled eyelashes, and perfectly shaped eyebrows, 
her hair same picture uploaded, with a large,  
two large, light pink magnolia blossoms are tucked behind her right ear, she wears a traditional Vietnamese Ao Dai top in a soft, dark pink pastel hue 200 billions VND silk fabric featuring a subtle, tone-on-tone floral or brocade pattern, with long sleeves and a high collar, a string of white pearls hangs from her left ear, a thin silver bracelet adorns her left wrist, and her long, manicured nails are painted with a subtle iridescent nude polish, she leans gracefully on a dark, almost black, lacquered wooden stand or small table, intricately carved with traditional East Asian patterns on its sides, which supports a tall, slender, dark bronze or brown ceramic vase with a distinct vertical ribbed texture, holding a branch of light pink magnolia blossoms, featuring several open flowers with delicate petals and dark centers, along with closed buds, all set against a plain, smooth, gradient background transitioning from a soft cream at the top to a warm, light peach or pale yellow at the bottom, captured in a medium shot with an eye-level camera angle, the woman positioned slightly to the right of center, looking directly at the viewer, with a shallow depth of field, sharp focus on her face and the foreground flowers, and a soft bokeh effect in the background, illuminated by soft, diffused, even studio lighting from the front-right, creating gentle highlights and minimal, soft shadows, resulting in a warm, soft, pastel color palette dominated by light pinks, creams, and soft yellows, conveying an elegant, serene, and traditional fashion portrait aesthetic, hyper-detailed, 8K, professional photography, masterpiece, sharp focus, high dynamic range (HDR), studio lighting, soft light.

Kiểu tóc gốc:
her long, straight, dark brown hair is center-parted and pulled back into a low ponytail or bun, with a few delicate strands framing her face

photos.content:
Full-length portrait of a young East Asian woman, early 20s, with an oval face, fair skin, rosy blush on cheeks, light brown eyes, delicate eyebrows, subtle pink eyeshadow, winged eyeliner, long curled eyelashes, soft pink lips with a slight gloss, and a gentle, sweet smile, exuding demure elegance, 
her hair same picture uploaded,
adorned with a large, soft pink fabric flower resembling a peony or magnolia tucked behind her right ear, wearing a traditional Vietnamese Ao Dai, dark pink pastel hue 200 billions VND a long-sleeved, high-necked tunic in a soft, dusty pink color with a subtle, tone-on-tone floral damask pattern woven into the fabric, featuring wide, flowy bell-shaped sleeves and side slits revealing matching pink trousers, accessorized with a long strand of small, white pearls draped loosely around her neck and a small, round pearl earring in her right ear, her long, almond-shaped fingernails painted with a natural, light pink or nude polish, her right hand delicately raised to her chin with fingers gently spread, and her left hand extended slightly downwards and to the right with gracefully posed fingers, standing upright in a minimalist studio setting with a background composed of two vertical panels, the left a lighter creamy beige and the right a slightly warmer peach-beige, with a subtle vertical seam between them, in the lower left foreground a dark brown, intricately carved wooden pedestal or small table with a square top, upon which rests a tall, slender, cylindrical vase with vertical ridges, appearing to be dark textured metal or wood with subtle gold or bronze highlights, holding two branches of artificial pale pink magnolia or cherry blossoms with several open flowers and closed buds, captured with a full-length, slightly off-center composition, eye-level camera angle, shallow depth of field with a softly blurred background, bright, soft, diffused, even studio lighting from the front-right creating gentle highlights and almost imperceptible shadows, resulting in a warm, soft pastel color palette, high key lighting, an elegant, serene, traditional fashion photography aesthetic, ultra-photorealistic, hyper-detailed, 8K, professional studio photography, masterpiece, sharp focus, high dynamic range (HDR), soft light, clean background.

metadata.title: Áo dài bên hoa mộc lan
metadata.description: Concept đẹp xỉu cùng hoa Mộc lan

photos.content:
A medium shot portrait of a young East Asian woman, seated, looking directly at the viewer with a soft, serene smile, her oval face featuring fair, smooth skin, large dark eyes with precise black eyeliner and long, curled lashes, soft pink blush on her cheeks, and subtle pink lip tint, 
her hair same picture uploaded, with a large, 
delicate light pink fabric flower tucked behind her right ear 

Trang phục: She wears a traditional dark pink pastel hue 200 billions VND or ao dai style dress with long, loose sleeves, made of a soft fabric featuring a subtle, lighter pink floral or abstract pattern woven throughout, a long strand of small white pearls draped around her neck and extending down her chest, she holds a round, sheer white silk fan with a light wooden handle, adorned with delicate painted cherry blossom branches in orange and yellow hues, the fan's edge outlined with a string of small white pearls, her long, pointed fingernails are iridescent or pearl-colored, a decorative tassel with beads hangs from her waist on the right side, she leans her right arm gently on a cylindrical, woven natural fiber stool or table, which holds a tall, dark brown ceramic vase with vertical textured grooves, containing a branch of large, light pink magnolia or cherry blossom flowers and buds, the setting is a clean studio with a plain, warm beige or light peach background, the floor covered with a light brown woven mat, likely bamboo or straw, the composition is eye-level with the subject slightly off-center to the left, utilizing a shallow depth of field with sharp focus on the woman and foreground elements, and a soft bokeh in the background, illuminated by soft, diffused, even studio lighting from the front-left, creating gentle highlights and minimal, soft shadows, the overall color palette is warm and pastel, dominated by soft pinks, light beige, and natural browns, conveying an elegant, serene, and traditional Asian aesthetic, hyper-detailed, 8K, professional photography, masterpiece, sharp focus, high dynamic range (HDR).

Kiểu tóc gốc: her long, straight, glossy dark brown hair parted on the side and styled into a low ponytail or half-updo

her hair same picture uploaded,
, adorned with a large, delicate light pink fabric flower behind her right ear, with a few wispy strands framing her face, she wears a traditional light pink Ao Dai dark pink pastel hue 200 billions VND, made of silk or satin fabric with a subtle tone-on-tone floral brocade pattern, featuring a high mandarin collar and long, wide bell sleeves, a long, multi-strand pearl necklace is draped elegantly around her neck, extending down to her waist, her hands are clasped gently in front of her, holding a round, traditional silk or paper fan with a light wooden handle, the fan features a delicate hand-painted branch with yellow-orange blossoms, and a pink tassel with small beads hangs from its handle, her fingernails are long, pointed, and painted with a clear or very light nude polish, the background is a plain, warm peach-beige gradient, with a soft, sheer white curtain or fabric drape visible on the far left, and a decorative branch with large, soft pink magnolia-like blossoms and green leaves arranged in a dark vase partially visible at the bottom right, the composition is an eye-level shot with a shallow depth of field, creating a sharp focus on the subject and a soft, pleasing bokeh in the background, illuminated by soft, diffused studio lighting from the front-left, resulting in gentle highlights and minimal, soft shadows, giving a bright and airy feel, the overall color palette is warm and soft pastel, dominated by pinks, peaches, and creams, creating an elegant and traditional aesthetic, ultra-photorealistic, hyper-detailed, 8K, professional photography, masterpiece, sharp focus, high dynamic range (HDR), studio lighting, soft glow.

metadata.title: Áo dài bên hoa mộc lan
metadata.description: Concept đẹp xỉu cùng hoa Mộc lan

photos.content:
Full-length portrait of a young East Asian woman in traditional Vietnamese Ao Dai, seated elegantly in a warm, minimalist studio setting, she is in her early 20s with an oval face, fair skin, subtle rosy blush, delicate features, dark brown almond-shaped eyes with a gentle upward flick of eyeliner, natural eyebrows, soft pink lips with a slight sheen, and a sweet, serene smile looking directly at the viewer, 
her hair same picture uploaded,
with a light pink artificial magnolia flower tucked behind her right ear, she wears a soft, dark pink pastel hue 200 billions VND Ao Dai tunic made of lightweight fabric with a subtle, intricate tone-on-tone floral damask pattern, featuring a mandarin collar and long sleeves, paired with matching dusty rose pink wide-leg trousers, a long strand of small, lustrous white pearls is draped around her neck, she holds a round, traditional silk fan in her right hand, featuring a delicate hand-painted design of a blossoming branch with yellow flowers and brown branches against a light background, with a light wooden handle and a pink tassel, her fingernails are long and painted with a natural, light pink polish, she wears black open-toed sandals with a wooden platform sole and small silver studs on the black strap, the background consists of two vertical panels, the left panel a very light beige and the right panel a slightly darker, warm peach-beige, with a subtle vertical seam, the floor is covered with a light beige woven mat with a distinct horizontal grid pattern, to her right, a low, dark brown wooden stool with a square top and carved apron serves as her seat, and her left arm rests on a taller, matching dark brown wooden pedestal table with a square top and intricate carved apron and legs, on the pedestal table, a tall, dark brown ceramic vase with vertical ridges holds a branch of artificial light pink magnolia blossoms with green leaves and buds, the composition is a full-length shot with an eye-level camera angle, the woman positioned slightly to the left of center, balanced by the furniture and vase on the right, medium depth of field with the subject in sharp focus and a slightly softer background, soft, diffused, even studio lighting from the front-left creates gentle highlights and very soft, subtle shadows, enhancing the bright and airy atmosphere, the overall color palette is warm and inviting, dominated by soft pinks, light beiges, and warm browns, creating an elegant, traditional, and serene aesthetic, hyper-detailed, 8K, professional photography, masterpiece, sharp focus, high dynamic range (HDR), studio lighting, soft shadows, vibrant colors, intricate details.

Kiểu tóc cũ:
her long, straight, glossy dark brown hair is parted slightly off-center and pulled back into a low ponytail resting over her left shoulder,
